title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: POL and LINK Each Fall 3.1% as Index Declines
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Bitcoin (BTC) was also among the underperformers, dipping 1.4%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3701.1, down 1.1% (-39.29) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Four of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (+4.6%) and ADA (+2.2%).

Laggards: POL (-3.1%) and LINK (-3.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 1.1% with most assets trading lower and only four of twenty assets trading higher.
